name: IridescencePalette, Haseritt
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to five of your normal unit rear-guards, and until end of turn, they get [Power] +2000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, draw a card, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.". If you chose three or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: A fresh and wonderful encounter for you!

name: Grimoire Etoile, Luticia
effect: [AUTO](VC):When you play a normal order, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of Cursed Play cards in your soul.・Two or more‐Draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・Four or more‐At the end of that battle, [COST][discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: They all support me. And I want to meet those expectations......!

name: Highest Dreamer, Lilfa
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and all of your grade 2 or greater rear-guards get "Boost" until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have three or more grade 2 or greater rear-guards in your back row, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a rear-guard each from your front row and back row, and return them to your hand. If you returned two cards, choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: A dream has to be massive! Huge! Like me!

name: Passionate Devotee, Sytreide
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if it was placed during your main phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.
flavor: Lil, you're big and cute today too......♡

name: Fondant Solace, Mediell
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2], reveal the top card of your deck, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.・Normal Unit‐Put that revealed card into your hand, choose a card from your drop, call it to (RC), and that called unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.・Trigger Unit‐[Counter-Charge 1], choose a card from your drop, and call it to (RC). (Return the revealed card to its original spot)
flavor: A little happiness for everyone to heal, is the type of idol I'd like to become.

name: #Make_A_Trend!! Kyouka
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade from 1 to 3, declare it, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with the declared grade from among them and call it to (RC), or choose up to one Magazine card from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. [CONT](VC):During your turn, if you played a Magazine order this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.
flavor: We'll be the ones making the trend from here on!♪

name: First to Head Towards a Dream! Michu
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you have a "All Set Up!" in your Order Zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.Cannonball-[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. [Glitter] (This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Aight, let's do it!

name: Adorable Shooter, Clanfelie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, [COST][put a grade 2 or less card from hand into soul], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 with [Power] 12000 or less, grade 2 with [Power] 9000 or less, or grade 1 with [Power] 7000 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you did not call a card, draw a card.
flavor: Lock-on, shoot♪ Your heart is now mine♡

name: Immense Aptitude, Relie
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your soul has no cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, this unit performs drive checks until end of that battle.
flavor: Unique abilities that can even capture rain clouds.

name: Overflow Happiness, Naustria
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name, look at the top three cards of your deck, choose one card from among them, put it into your soul, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your soul has two or more Cursed Play cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If your soul has four or more Cursed Play cards, [Power] +15000 instead of +5000.
flavor: Wan wan? Hef eak hugeher.

name: Dearly Flowers, Alise
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked a grade 3 or greater unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from drop by the ability of your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, this unit gets "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit." until end of turn.
flavor: These flowers hold my thoughts to be together with everyone forever.

name: Blue Frontier, Arche
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you played a Magazine order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacked, if you played a Magazine order this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Flap your wings, and ride on the new wind towards the blue sky.

name: Boisterous High Tension, Roxella
effect: Friend-[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have three or more other "Friends", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you have five or more, choose one of your rear-guards with the "Friend" ability not in the same column as this unit, and you may return it to your hand.
flavor: Showering with the fountain. That is a "forbidden play".

name: Cooling Heart, Yuika
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit in the same column as this unit is placed, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a rear-guard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of the boosted rear-guards, and return it to your hand.
flavor: I'll handle the cleanup. Please rest early.

name: Shy Vocal, Noqno
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When a card is put into your Order Zone, if you do not have a unit with "Noqno" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to your back row center (RC). (You can only call one of this card if there are two in your drop)[Glitter]-Michu (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Michu" in its card name)[AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and swap the position of your vanguard with this unit. At the end of that turn, swap the position of that swapped unit with this unit. (The soul does not move)
flavor: Would you...... Like to listen to my song?

name: Approaching Summer, Aaltje
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your grade 3 or greater vanguard's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is returned to hand by your vanguard's ability, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Clean quick and play hard♪

name: Favorite One, Fleurety
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is returned to hand by your grade 3 or greater vanguard's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], draw a card, choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: Isn't this amazing?! Wanna try it on? Wanna try?

name: Large Wheel that Colors the Night, Palmira
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: This sound that resonates within...... Seems to be right where it's meant to be.

name: Neverending Summer, Tatum
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your damage zone has a face up order card, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put a unit card from hand into your damage zone face up], choose a face up order card from your damage zone, and put it into your hand.
flavor: There are still things I've not done.

name: Shutter Chance, Ilse
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, if your Order Zone has "All Set Up!", look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one [Glitter] or set order from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you revealed a card, put this unit on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Hmm, that's a nice expression. Let me take a picture.

name: Swelting Heat, Lucretia
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and look at the top card of your deck. (Return it to its original spot after checking)
flavor: Can't get rid of the heat no matter how I fan. Nothing but sweat dripping.

name: Meddlesome Wellness Committee, Phyllis
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your grade 3 or greater vanguards with "Mediell" in its card name, and until end of turn, it gets [Power] +5000, and the cost of that unit's original [ACT] ability becomes "[Counter-Blast 1]".[AUTO](RC):When your other unit is placed on (RC) from drop, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I've got to replenish the common medicines someday.

name: Inconspicuous Ambuscade, Museta
effect: Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, if your soul has no cards, all of your front row units get [Power] +2000 until end of turn. At the end of that battle, [COST][put this unit on the bottom of deck], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The bus that Miss Herm is on is coming......!

name: Favor To You, Lijdia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Fortia" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [Counter-Charge 1]." until end of turn.
flavor: Try this, it helps a lot as it passes through the throat~

name: Mystica Pellucid, Jennifer
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have four or more units, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a normal order from your drop, and it gets "[CONT]:This card can be played from the drop, and when it would be put into your drop after play, put it on the bottom of your deck instead." until end of turn.
flavor: Looks like they're ready. I think it's my turn next.

name: Any Color Bubbles, Shaelyn
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your back row center rear-guards, and move it to an open front row (RC).
flavor: The transparent future may possibly embrace any color.

name: Clear Shimmer, Aura
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][retire this unit], search your deck for up to one order card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: The world reflected in your eyes looks like it's shining bright.

name: Two Of Us, Flow
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if the attacking unit's [Critical] is 2 or greater, and its [Critical] is increased by a non-trigger effect ability or its original [Critical] is 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Atop the waves that don't align, is the flow that will reach you tomorrow-♪

name: Two Of Us, Rhyme
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. (Active if this battle is its second attack this turn or more)
flavor: This irrelevant lifestyle is what the lovely Rhyme prefers--!

name: Lyrical ShootingStarS
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Kyouka" in its card name!Perform all of the following according to the number of your units.・Two or more grade 1 units‐Draw two cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.・Two or more grade 2 units‐Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.・Two or more grade 3 units‐[Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: A must-have fashion magazine that covers the latest trends.

name: Anathema Slap Twinkle
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name!Put this card into your soul, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle. If your soul has four or more Cursed Play cards, draw a card.
flavor: As these confetti are amulets made by me, they come with some anti-demon powers, however little.

name: Early Adoptor, Loviisa
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], choose a "Lyrical ShootingStarS" from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: The antenna as high up as usual, trying to "shine".

name: Early Afternoon Elegance, Racclene
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit cannot attack the vanguard, and this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: For now, shall we just enjoy passing time this way?

name: Squeeze Out, Unity
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your Order Zone, and put it into your hand.
flavor: To squeeze out the best lyrics...... Don't give up, me!

name: Schedule Coordinating, Remory
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if your Order Zone has "All Set Up!", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a Cannonball card from your drop, and put it into your Order Zone.
flavor: If it's this...... We'll make it for the live performance somehow.

name: Solis Lacrima, Ninon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your soul. If you put it into your soul, look at the top card of your deck. (Return it to its original spot after checking)
flavor: Mysterious grace will come upon us with the warm light.

name: Almost Late! Prufla
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, choose a grade 2 or less normal unit with "Lilfa" in its card name from your drop, and you may put it into your soul. If you put it into your soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Hurry, hurry. The textbooks are heavy!

name: Hydrangea Awaiting Clear Weather, Philine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your grade 3 or greater vanguard's ability, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I wonder if it'll clear up by the time of the evening party......

name: Aiming for Rainbow, Theophania
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your damage zone has more cards than your opponent's, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: A rainbow will definitely appear after the rain stops.

name: Shape of Cat's Cradle, Sylphia
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard is put on the bottom of your deck during your battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit's attack hit a vanguard, [COST][put this unit on the bottom of deck], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Well, what are you gonna do now~♪

name: Especial Days, Faustina
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your other units.
flavor: The days we've been together are on the first page of my precious memories.

name: Running High, Menia
effect: Friend-[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have other "Friends", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Hey now! Let's become friends and have fun~!

name: Diva of Aptness, Astrid
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When your rear-guard is placed by the ability of your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to an open (RC).
flavor: She'll always be found where the bustle is.

name: Class is Boring, Modett
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a Cursed Play card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Whew~ Let's go to Lu's place today too~

name: Fascinating Disposition, Varii
effect: Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, if your soul has no cards, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Irresistably attractive glossy fur.

name: Best Choice, Laudomia
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kyouka" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose a grade 2 or greater unit card from your drop with a different card name as your vanguard, and put it on the top of your deck.
flavor: What~ Flavor~...... Is my tongue looking for~?

name: Positive Mind, Elsa
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for every two of your units. (Includes this unit)
flavor: That floaty feeling......! It can be used in the dance!

name: Nocturne of Flickering Lambency, Judith
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: My time with my dear sister cannot be interrupted even by deities.

name: Munch Munch Lunch, Cowlina
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your rear-guard is put on the bottom of your deck during your battle phase, if you have a vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Eat up, and work hard during the afternoon lectures.

name: Flower Cannonball
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone)Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put into your Order Zone, draw a card. [ACT]Order Zone:If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Michu" in its card name, [COST][put this card into your drop], and change all of your vanguard's Cannonball abilities to "[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose three of your units, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn." until end of turn.
flavor: Sparkly and exciting...... This is the stage of my dreams!

name: Cursed Sugar Sparkle
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name!Put this card into your soul, and [Soul-Charge 1]. Choose up to one card from your soul with grade less than or equal to your vanguard, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: If it's this brilliant, everyone can have a good time even if my dance isn't that good......!

name: The Rain is Like a Maiden's Heart, Riseley
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played a normal order this turn, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: No~! Today's supposed to be clear for the whole day~!

name: Sudden Shower, Luella
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your soul, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Thanks for the towel~ What a heavy downpour huh.

name: Splash Delight, Persis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Jumping bubbles and overlapping voices. The time is now, the precious moment.

name: Brighter than the Sun, Viine
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have "All Set Up!" in your Order Zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. Then, [COST][put a set order from your drop on the bottom of your deck], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: She radiates more than ever under the sunshine.

name: Flapping Sound of the Wind, Krisje
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from drop, choose one of your vanguards with "Mediell" in its card name, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The bouncy heart floats gently.

name: Hurry Morning, Mucul
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each different grade among your other rear-guards.
flavor: It wouldn't be wrong if I had just counted properly!

name: Diva of Water Spray, Precie
effect: [CONT](GC):If your Order Zone has a set order, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: That singing voice is said to be able to wash your hesitation away.

name: Literary Act, Carissa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your soul has two or more Cursed Play cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit into your soul.
flavor: Keep it up. I'll do my best too.

name: Helianthus Girl, Fawne
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your front row has no other rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: One who heads towards the light, more straightforward than anyone else.

name: Magic Hour Ballad, Minmy
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, choose one of your units in another column, and you may have it get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you do, put this unit on the bottom of your deck at the end of that battle.
flavor: A captivating singing voice that can only be heard at the witching hour.

name: Sparkling Summer! Michu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a grade 1 card with "Michu" in its card name, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Noqno" in its card name or one Cannonball card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter] (This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: I'll make even the flowers smile!

name: Crepuscule, Agrea
effect: Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Anywhere's fine, as long as I can sing to my heart's content.

name: Floating in Paradise, Ludivine
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your soul has two or more Cursed Play cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: It shines in a flash, and sparkles like bubbles~

name: Well-informed, Fedelm
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you played a Magazine order this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: There's nothing that I don't know about of this genre.

name: Azure Resonating Holiness, Ulviel
effect: [CONT](RC):If this unit is "Friends", it gets "[AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.".
flavor: The girl plays in the sky, singing to the pure white friendship.

name: Best-love Moment, Lilfa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Lilfa" in its card name, choose one of your grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand.
flavor: I'm happy to be blessed with good friends~

name: Heavy Leaning on Expectations, Luticia
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has a Cursed Play card, when you would ride a grade 3 card with "Luticia" in its card name from your ride deck, you can ride with "[Soul-Blast 1] card with "Luticia" in its card name" instead of "Choose a card from your hand, and discard it".
flavor: An interview for a diva of the new era......? Who, me......!?

name: #Hot_Stuff, Kyouka
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Kyouka" in its card name, choose up to one Magazine card from your drop, and put it into your hand. If you did not put it into your hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one Magazine card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Hot~ My makeup is gonna melt~

name: Making Smiles Bloom, Mediell
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Mediell" in its card name, look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and discard the rest.
flavor: Hehe, it pays to have worked hard taking care of them.

name: Undecided True White, Haseritt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Haseritt" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to one grade 3 or less card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, draw a card.
flavor: I've gotta look for a personality that wouldn't lose to others too.

name: Refresh Breeze, Ailu
effect: [CONT](GC):During the battle your vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name is attacked, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Phew~ This is absolutely necessary on a day like this~

name: I'monStage! Ronovea
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you have "All Set Up!" in your Order Zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: Ladies and gentlemen! Boys and girls! Come and listen to my song!!

name: Calm Benevolence, Mayme
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Hey, would you stay still? Let me wipe your mouth.

name: Can't Stand the Heat, York
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one "Lyrical ShootingStarS" from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Hah~ Let's look for solutions before we faint to this heat~

name: In Search of Something Big! Blair
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has two or more Cursed Play cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Trap set perfectly! Today's the day I'll catch a big one!

name: Considerate Committee Chief, Shaznay
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Don't worry. I'll be with you until you understand this.

name: Staying In Even On Days Off, Luticia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Luticia" in its card name, [COST][put a card from hand on the bottom of deck], search your deck for up to one Cursed Play card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: It's not like I can't move due to muscle aches, okay? It's true, okay?

name: Sheltered Girl of the Pharmacy, Mediell
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Mediell" in its card name, choose up to one grade 2 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, reveal the top card of your deck, and if it is a trigger unit, [Rest] the unit called by this effect.
flavor: Is it the medicine? If you're okay with me being an apprentice......

name: Return Trip of the Crimson Hour, Merrilyn
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your rear-guard was put on the bottom of your deck this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Let's go home together. I want to hear more about your day.

name: Minimal Style, Fuuka
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if your soul has one or more cards, this unit cannot attack and cannot boost.
flavor: Beauty is to reduce the unnecessary and improve further.

name: Playing with Wings, Raakel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your back row has a grade 2 or greater unit, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Ahahah♪ It's ticklish~♪

name: Extra-large Room, Lilfa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Lilfa" in its card name, choose up to one grade 2 or greater card from your hand, call it to your back row center (RC), and it gets "Boost" until end of turn. If you called a card, draw a card.
flavor: With a big body, it takes that much longer to get dressed too.

name: Bouncy Gait, Haseritt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Haseritt" in its card name, choose up to one grade 2 or less normal unit from your hand, call it to (RC), and until end of turn, it gets [Power] +2000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, draw a card, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.".
flavor: Fufu, are these all the things needed for the lesson?

name: Happy Shopping! Michu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a grade 0 with "Michu" in its card name, search your deck for up to one "All Set Up!", put it into your Order Zone, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter] (This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: This and that...... Ah, and those too!

name: Sherbet Allure, Ripley
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have two or more grade 2 or greater rear-guards in your back row, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I'll resume my diet tomorrow~♪ Shall we have some ice-cream?

name: Resting Her Back on Wisteria Trellis, Vepur
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into soul, and put a blitz order from hand into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Let's take shelter from the rain for just a bit......

name: Expert Fluffer, Teuna
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your other "Friends".
flavor: How's that, take your time lazing around~

name: Radiant Smile, Michelle
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: And if you bask in the light, you'll grow bigger!

name: #Ready_To_Go, Kyouka
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Kyouka" in its card name, choose a grade from 1 to 3, declare it, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with the declared grade or Magazine card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Doesn't a day with great makeup make you feel like everything's going to be fine?

name: Saturate Fortune, Lorena
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your drop has a Magazine card, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: I've collected lots of today's lucky item~♪

name: Refreshingly Basking, Juut
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck. If you put it on the bottom of your deck, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Haa, this is comfortable~ I wonder if I'll ever be back for lectures.

name: Recruiting Club Members! Millicent
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose a grade 2 or greater unit card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Won't you engage in youthful perspiration with us!?

name: Afternoon Dance Lesson, Michu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Hop Step Kaboom!

name: Physical Training from Scratch, Luticia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Super Large-scale Newbie! Lilfa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Amazing! This floor doesn't shake at all even when I dance!

name: #First_Step, Kyouka
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: This is much easier than our training back in the village~♪

name: Brand New Start, Haseritt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: We've worked up a good sweat! Isn't it fun to remember steps♪

name: To Work Harder, Mediell
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: I'll get...... The recipe for recovery medicine back home......

name: Original Style, Elshuka
flavor: You can't use anyone else's. Wear your individual personality.

name: Grinning Dragon Scale, Ilze
flavor: I want to try this today. Will you keep a lookout?

name: Aplomb Sight, Grete
flavor: Needs is something that changes everyday.

name: Diligent Follower, Siguel
flavor: The accumulation of knowledge will connect you to a definite result.

name: Glee Singing, Tetoel
flavor: A brilliant resonating sound, to bring smiles to others.

name: Running-start Youth, Haida
flavor: Change overflowing passion into energy to move forward.

name: Peaceful Garden, Anika
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The air of recovery overflows, and naturally brings forth more smiles.

name: Soft Light, Pruel
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: A charm to work hard. I'll hang it here.

name: All Set Up!
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone)[ACT]Order Zone:If you have a vanguard with "Michu" in its card name, [COST][[Rest] this card], [Soul-Charge 1], choose up to one Cannonball card from your hand, and put it into your Order Zone.
flavor: Which. One. Shall. It. Be.

name: IridescencePalette, Haseritt
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to five of your normal unit rear-guards, and until end of turn, they get [Power] +2000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, draw a card, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.". If you chose three or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Grimoire Etoile, Luticia
effect: [AUTO](VC):When you play a normal order, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of Cursed Play cards in your soul.・Two or more‐Draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・Four or more‐At the end of that battle, [COST][discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Highest Dreamer, Lilfa
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and all of your grade 2 or greater rear-guards get "Boost" until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have three or more grade 2 or greater rear-guards in your back row, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a rear-guard each from your front row and back row, and return them to your hand. If you returned two cards, choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).

name: Passionate Devotee, Sytreide
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if it was placed during your main phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.

name: Fondant Solace, Mediell
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2], reveal the top card of your deck, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.・Normal Unit‐Put that revealed card into your hand, choose a card from your drop, call it to (RC), and that called unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.・Trigger Unit‐[Counter-Charge 1], choose a card from your drop, and call it to (RC).

name: #Make_A_Trend!! Kyouka
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade from 1 to 3, declare it, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with the declared grade from among them and call it to (RC), or choose up to one Magazine card from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. [CONT](VC):During your turn, if you played a Magazine order this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.

name: First to Head Towards a Dream! Michu

name: Adorable Shooter, Clanfelie

name: Overflow Happiness, Naustria
